articles.author: By  JERUSALEM POST STAFF
articles.title: 'Trump is greatest friend Israel has ever had,' Netanyahu says in exclusive interview - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: Israel has no greater friend than America, "especially under President Trump's leadership," he said.
articles.content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called US President Donald Trump "the greatest friend that Israel has ever had in the White House," in an exclusive Fox News interview that aired on Saturday night, … [+2428 chars]

articles.author: Chris Harris
articles.title: All 'major pieces' from midair DC crash recovered -- as it releases new images of wreckage: NTSB - New York Post
articles.description: The “major pieces” of the American Airlines plane and the Black Hawk helicopter have been recovered, and will be transported to a “secure airport facility for further examination …
articles.content: All of the plane and chopper wreckage has been fished from the icy Potomac River, as the National Transportation Safety Board continues to investigate the Jan. 29 mid-air crash that killed 67 people.… [+2257 chars]
